King Skabb gives a cry of anger, and leaps at you in desperation, swinging a spiked mace in his hand. You must fight him, adding 3 if you have some rat poison to put on your weapon.
If you use the poison,
cross it off
your Adventure Sheet.

If you lose, your adventuring career will be over, unless you have a resurrection deal.
